description: Columbia University allowed police to storm campus Tuesday night, and Wednesday morning, the NYPD Deputy Commissioner accused student protestors of using an "industrial" chain to barricade doors.
title: Bike Lock NYPD Insists Is 'Industrial' Protest Tool Is a Normal Lock Recommended by Columbia University

description: The agency tasked with preserving the historical record is banning ChatGPT, citing the possibility that the tool would leak internal information.
title: National Archives Bans Employee Use of ChatGPT

description: The source of a long mysterious 17-second snippet of music; a service that scraped and sold Discord server messages; and influencers using fake, AI-powered livestream apps.
title: Podcast: A Lost Media Mystery
